description: lookup_plan9.go: Plan 9 is not happy if you give it an empty hostname. CS complains. This fixes the problem while not changing behavior for any other OS.

messages.text:
Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

Please take another look.

Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

I'd like you to review this change to
https://go.googlecode.com/hg/

You need to do a "hg sync". I believe this is already fixed.

fhs
